explains: adj. 精力充沛的；精力恢复的
v. 修复；恢复健康（restore 的过去式与过去分词）
wordGroup: backup and restore 备份与还原

sentences.en: He is now fully restored to health.
sentences.cn: 他现在完全恢复了健康。

sentences.en: The house has been lovingly restored.
sentences.cn: 这所房子已经过精心修复。

sentences.en: Order was quickly restored after the riots.
sentences.cn: 暴乱过后秩序很快得到了恢复。
